short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display everything you need to know about a token, all in under a second.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Decrypt-o-max gives you a quick and easy way to get basic informations about cryptocurrencies you see on the internet. Simply put your cursor on a coin's name, symbol or contract and press H to display a summary of what this cryptocurrency does, its price history, social media platforms, etc... Decrypt-o-max also works on Ethereum and BSC addresses - displaying the current balance quickly.


Data provided by CoinGecko, Etherscan and BscScan.
